channel.title: Contributings on sammler.io Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Contributings on sammler.io Documentation

item.title: Contributing/Index
item.description: Primarily I do - especially at the beginning and in the next months - not expect any contributions, and that’s fine. I might pretty slowly progress on this project, as this is just a private project, only working on it in my free time. But stop: You might have similar requirements and interest, so please do not hesitate to drop me a line and add your thoughts. Even if you do not want to actively participate, I am very interested in listening to your opinion and your related requirements.

item.title: Naming convention for services
item.description: sammler-* - Core services sammler-nodelib-* - node.js libraries sammler-golib-* - GoLang libraries. sammler-middleware-* - Pluggable middleware sammler-middleware-{service}-db - Storage for the given middleware. sammler-middleware-{service}-{dep} - Other dependent service for the given middleware.

item.title: node.js Standards
item.description: For all node.js projects, the following standards should be used. This is certainly not obligatory, but helps to keep some kind of common flavor across several projects. General express.js
